alert.note: Alert for Elkhart (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 8:41PM EST until January 20 at 10:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Lowered visibility to less than quarter of a mile in the bursts of heavier snow. * WHERE...In Indiana, Elkhart County. The highest snowfall totals are expected across the northern portions of Elkhart County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Moderate to heavy bands of lake effect snow showers this evening, with some diminishment in coverage and intensity late evening and overnight. Additional lake effect snow showers are expected on Saturday with light additional snow accumulations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
